attributes.action: Support us in boycotting any business that threatens to relocate post Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Did you know that companies including HSBC, EasyJet & Vodafone are considering a move of their offices out of the UK and into mainland Europe? This would mean that over 5,000 UK jobs are at risk. We need your help to stop this happening.
Help us to put the GREAT back into Great Britain by boycotting these companies & any others that threaten to leave the UK. 
A united, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland & England must stand together by supporting UK based companies. #Letstakebackthepower
attributes.background: We want the people of the United Kingdom to unite and threaten to boycott, the services and products of any business, that plans to relocate out of the UK, post Brexit, risking thousands of British jobs.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on members of the public, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
